      • BackendServer

        public BackendServer​(java.net.Socket aSocket,
                     java.io.BufferedReader socketIn,
                     java.io.PrintWriter socketOut,
                     java.io.ObjectOutputStream objectOut,
                     java.lang.String sqlUserName,
                     java.lang.String sqlPass,
                     java.lang.String sqlSchema)
        Constructor for BackenServer, initializes socket/stream information from the server, and creates new course/student database initializers
        Parameters:
        aSocket - Socket to be initialized as aSocket
        socketIn - BufferedReader to be initialized as socketIn
        socketOut - PrintWriter to be initialized as socketOut
        objectOut - ObjectOutputStream to be initialized as objectOut
        sqlUserName - SQL username to be used
        sqlPass - SQL Password to be used
        sqlSchema - SQL Schema to be used
